page.title: 12 An Interesting Person
page.content: Our interesting person is{Mrs. {Flannigan}who has been an{Auxiliary}at {Bellfield Primary School,}since 1971. An Auxiliary cares for children when they are sick or unwell. She also helps the staff in the school. Mrs Flannigan has lived in our D-block since 1962 in both Shortlees and Bellfield. Her{hobbies}are reading, knitting, dancing and wine making and she is an active member of the Church Guild.She has noticed{a change in life {styles}over the years caused by the {increase in unemployment.}Mrs. Flannigan enjoys the facilities of the {Bellfield Policy}which offers walks, gardens, bowling and pitch and put, although she feels that these amenities could be more attractive. Her other activities include being an active member of the trade union MATSA.
